text: fbrhmt min allah lak wlashabk -ayha alnby- mnn allah ealayk fknt rfyqana bhm, walaw kunt syiy alkhulq qasy alqlb, lansaraf ashabk min hwlk, fala twakhdhhm bima kan minhum fi ghzw "'uhd", was'al allah -ayha alnby- 'an yaghfir lhm, washawirhum fi al'umur alty tahtaj 'iilaa mshwrt, fa'iidha eazamt ealaa 'amr min al'umur -bed alastshart- f'amdih metmdana ealaa allah whdh, 'iina allah yuhibu almutawakilin elyh
